product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Shepherd's Potato Stew with Beef - 2 Servings
long_description: The Backpacker's Pantry Shepherd's Potato Stew with Beef includes creamy mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese, vegetables and beef in a creamy stew. Easy to prepare-just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for 13 min. and serve. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Backpacker's Pantry Shepherd's Potato Stew with Beef includes creamy mashed potatoes, cheddar cheese, vegetables and beef in a creamy stew.
